text: Jean Josselin (6 January 1940 – 7 February 2021) was a French welterweight boxer. He competed at the 1960 Olympics and won a bronze medal at the 1961 European Amateur Boxing Championships. Josselin died on 7 February 2021, aged 81, one month and one day after his birthday.Jean Josselin, légende de la boxe à Besançon, est mort à l’âge de 81 ans ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for France Category:French boxers Category:Sportspeople from Besançon
title: Jean Josselin
